summary: This bill, the Rural Small Business Resilience Act, mandates the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to improve disaster assistance access for individuals in rural areas. Specifically, the bill directs the Associate Administrator of the Office of Disaster Recovery and Resilience to ensure full access to assistance, including targeted outreach and marketing, within a year of the Act's enactment. It also makes a technical amendment, renumbering a section of the Small Business Act.
